title: (x) OrgPlus logo and website banner - Akzidenz-Grotesk Old Face {Stephen}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812180842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/header-image-5example_3756.jpg)

Hey Typophiles -

What type would OrgPlus be set in?

I'm more of the Display font specialist - I know my Gunhead Chick from Mars Police from Pricedown. Sanserifs for heds and body are a little beyond me - little help!

Best,

Marko
author: deleteboy

comments.content: Looks like Neue Helvetica Bold but its not. Its also not Akzidenz or Univers.
It sure looks like Sage Bold.

Stephen Coles\> You're right! I had to take closer look at the lowercase e.

Mikey

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812180842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sage-bold_6215.png)

This is ‘Sage Bold’. I googled it and found nothing but a couple of references. It comes with four weights and two widths. And clearly, is _a bit_ like that AG Old Face… Does anybody know anything about Sage? And what’s it doing on my HD?
I think so too. It would be nice if someone knew for sure, though.
